name: De Visu - Data Catalog - FORS
description: Online data catalog offering detailed views and access to datasets from various Swiss and European social science research projects, including the European Social Survey (Swiss data), MOSAiCH, Eurobarometer (Swiss data), election studies (Selects, VOXIT, VOTO), and the Swiss Household Panel.
owner_name: FORS - Swiss Centre of Expertise in the Social Sciences
